entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 01:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 10.0°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
